name: The Five Tasks LITE (FNaF Fan Game)
name_original: The Five Tasks LITE (FNaF Fan Game)
description:
This is the remastered version of two old games of mine, 'The Five Memories' and 'The Five Tasks'. These games were both new concepts I was trying. Especially The Five Tasks. I loved the game but I never finished it because I couldn't come up with good ideas years ago. But now, I have done it. The largest FNaF Fan Game I have created.

The game will give you the instructions in How to Play and during gameplay.

Credits:

Games by me, graphics by me, camera images are from FNaF 3, Dormatabis, and more. Code by me, office is from an unknown source, sounds by me and FesliyanStudios, music by me.
